name: df-ginv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cgn, cmpt(s0, cgr, cmpt(s1, crn(cv(s0)), crio(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cgi, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ inv =(s0 ∈ GrpOp ↦(s1 ∈ ran(s0)↦ iota(s2 ∈ ran(s0),(s2[s0]s1)=(GId ` s0))))
comment: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's inverse function. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
